item.title: Loading Multiple Files into a DataFrame
item.description:
This is a quick tidbit for showing how we can load multiple files with the same structure in a folder into a dataframe. You can either read all the files separately and bind them together into one single dataframe using bind_rows() or you can do this with one line of code using one of the options below.
